attributes.action: change the MPs pension scheme so that it becomes a define contributions scheme with a limit of 4% of salary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The pension scheme enjoyed by MPs is now seriously out of kilter with the pensions arrangements of the rest of the nation. If MPs were to have to endure the same system as the majority of nation they would take more interest in securing the well being of future generations of pensioners.
